Timestamps use .toString() instead of .toISOString() for ISO format. Task createdAt, updatedAt, and Session expiresAt use new Date().toString() instead of new Date().toISOString()

Dashboard displays hardcoded mock user name 'User' instead of actual user's name from session/database
